titleStmt.title: A living testimony from the power and spirit of our Lord Jesus Christ in our faithful womens meeting and Christian Socity [sic] given forth in the universal union, and approbation thereof, according to our several proportions of faith and life in the same spirit.

A living testimony from the power and spirit of our Lord Jesus Christ in our faithful womens meeting and Christian Socity [sic] given forth in the universal union, and approbation thereof, according to our several proportions of faith and life in the same spirit.
titleStmt.author: Forster, Mary, 1619?-1686.
Society of Friends. London Yearly Meeting of Women Friends.

notesStmt.note: "Signed by us, in the behalf of the rest of our sincere minded members of our meeting, London, from our Womens Meeting, gathered out of the city and suburbs, the 1st of the 4th moneth, 1685 -- Mary Forster" [and others]
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

orgName.name: Society of Friends.
London Yearly Meeting of Women Friends.
